determinerFormeDuTapis(ArrayList<Carte>) - Static method in class Modele.Plateau
(5)
If the variation of game is classic (Rectangle 5x3)
+ Reduce the selection of the card's table once you have determined the edge of the rectangle
+ Determine the shape of the final rectangle 5x3 base on cards played
We determine this rectangle by its coordinates (x, y) Minimize zone of cards that can be put into table, Check with all possibilities defined if the position is available
